overview.title: GROUNDBREAKING DUAL-LENS, A HISTORICPAIRING
overview.text: Huawei and Leica combine to create a stunning dual-lens camera in a smartphone. More light and better clarity, for amazing photos and videos.

overview.title: REINVENT SMARTPHONE PHOTOGRAPHY
overview.text: Blending superior hardware and software with Leica dual lenses, the Huawei P9 enables you to capture high quality pictures without compromising on the handset’s sleek and compact style.

overview.title: GROUNDBREAKING DUAL-LENS
overview.text: The Huawei P9 captures brilliant colour, striking black and white and the emotional appeal of Leica images. Capture more light with two sensors, one RGB and one monochrome. Get incredible shots with the Huawei P9’s merging algorithm, which intelligently combines the colours taken by the RGB sensor with the detail of the monochrome sensor. Shoot better in low light with the 1.25µm pixel size of the dual 12-megapixel cameras, and bring a professional quality to your photos in all conditions with the Huawei P9’s IMAGEsmart 5.0 technology. Achieve professional camera like photo quality with the Leica co-engineered Picture Quality Algorithm, even in low light.

overview.title: CLEAR, FAST, PRECISE IMAGERY
overview.text: Capture sharp images with built-in dual-core ISP, professional DSP, and the depth measurement ISP for improved image focusing, speeds, processing. Take photos with incredible speed, depth and clarity with ‘Hybrid Focus’ technology, using laser focus, depth measurement and contrast. Experience superior performance via the custom chipset powered by the Kirin 955 processor. Inside the Kirin 955, there is one dual core ISP fast merging, optimized colour and noise management, and a dedicated DSP for post processing.

overview.title: A PROFESSIONAL CAMERA EFFECT
overview.text: Achieve professional photographic effects and access a powerful array of unique functions, including a choice of film modes, wide aperture effect, monochrome mode and professional mode. Create stunning images through the wide aperture effect. Reproduce authentic colours through a range of film modes: Standard, Vivid and Smooth Colours. Edit your images without compromising their quality through the Huawei P9’s professional mode with RAW output.

overview.title: SUPERB SELFIES, DAY OR NIGHT
overview.text: With an 8 megapixel front-facing camera, you can achieve superior selfies even in low light.

overview.title: PREMIUM. ELEGANT. STYLISH.
overview.text: The Huawei P9 is created by some of the world’s top industrial designers to achieve a visually stunning design with diamond-cut edges, rounded out by beautiful curvatures. The Huawei P9 is sculpted using aerospace-class unibody aluminum and a superior-grade 2.5D glass.

overview.title: BOLD, COLOURFUL DISPLAY
overview.text: Discover a more vivid world that’s even closer to natural colours on a stunning 5.2" FHD display with 96% colour saturation and high contrast.

specification.title: CPU
text: HUAWEI Kirin 955 ARM 4xCortex A72 2.5GHz+4xCortex A53 1.8GHz 64bit big.LITTLE technology

specification.title: Camera
text: Rear Camera: Dual 12 MP, f/2.2, 27 mm, Leica optics, phase detection autofocus, dual-LED (dual tone) flash

specification.title: Audio
text: Audio encoding: MP3, MP4, 3GP, WMA, OGG, AMR, AAC, FLAC, WAV, MIDI, RA

specification.title: Video
text: Video encoding: 3GP, MP4, WMV, RM, RMVB, ASF
